title: NO LIBS = NO FUN, Gentrification Explanation? 7.7.20
itunes:title: NO LIBS = NO FUN, Gentrification Explanation? 7.7.20
description:
In episode 666, Miles and guest host Jamie Loftus are joined by comedian Pallavi Gunalan to discuss new evidence in the Breonna Taylor case, more info on the Parler app, what is going on with Quibi, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Discontinued Candy
  2. Breonna Taylor’s Family Says LMPD Search Warrant Was Tied to Louisville Gentrification Project in Updated Lawsuit
  3. ‘Parler feels like a Trump rally’ — and MAGA world says that’s a problem
  4. Is Anyone Watching Quibi? The streaming platform raised $1.75 billion and secured a roster of A-list talent, but it can’t get audiences to notice.
  5. WATCH: ENNIO MORRICONE -"Death Rides a Horse" (1967)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
